com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.record

Class OClassTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orientechnologies.orient.core.db.record.OClassTrigger

  • public class OClassTrigger
extends Object
    Author : henryzhao81@gmail.com Feb 19, 2013

    Create a class OTriggered which contains 8 additional class attributes, which link to OFunction - beforeCreate - afterCreate - beforeRead - afterRead - beforeUpdate - afterUpdate - beforeDelete - afterDelete
